org.jclouds.glesys.features
Interface IpAsyncApi

public interface IpAsyncApi

Provides asynchronous access to IP Addresses via their REST API.

Author:
Adrian Cole, Mattias Holmqvist, Adam Lowe
See Also:
IpApi,
